Name: Michael Thompson
Description: Anterior cervical discectomy for neural decompression and anterior interbody fusion C5-C6 utilizing Bengal cage.
Transcription: PREOPERATIVE DIAGNOSES:,  ,1.  Spondylosis with cervical stenosis C5-C6 greater than C4-C5, C6-C7, (721.0, 723.0).,2.  Neck pain with left radiculopathy, progressive (723.1/723.4).,3.  Headaches, progressive (784.0).,POSTOPERATIVE DIAGNOSES:,  ,1.  Spondylosis with cervical stenosis C5-C6 greater than C4-C5, C6-C7, (721.0, 723.0).,2.  Neck pain with left radiculopathy, progressive (723.1/723.4).,3.  Headaches, progressive (784.0).,PROCEDURES:,  ,1.  Anterior cervical discectomy at C5-C6 for neural decompression (63075).,2.  Anterior interbody fusion C5-C6 (22554) utilizing Bengal cage (22851).,3.  Anterior cervical instrumentation at C5-C6 for stabilization by Uniplate construction at C5-C6 (22845); with intraoperative x-ray x2.,SERVICE:  ,  Neurosurgery,ANESTHESIA:,
